data.text:
Domäne am See

Simmern

Set in the scenic Hunsrück countryside, the lakeside Domäne am See offers modern, colourful accommodation as well as a playground and beer garden. Free WiFi and free parking are provided... view morefrom

€ 60Holiday Home Hartwig Benzweiler

Benzweiler

This holiday home is on the edge of the village of Benzweiler. The home has an uninterrupted view of the fine Hunsrück landscape. There is a play area and lawn beside a stream. You can enjoy barbeques here in the summer... view morefrom

€ 55Hunsrück Stern

Simmern

Featuring a spacious restaurant with terrace, Hunsrück Stern is quietly located in Simmern. Guests enjoy free use of a garage for bicycles and motorbikes. Each homelike room has satellite TV and a private bathroom... view morefrom

€ 30Gästehaus No. 3

Simmern

Located in Simmern, Gästehaus No. 3 provides free WiFi access, warmly decorated rooms and a garden terrace. The Simmersee lake is just 3 km from the guest house. Each of the rooms at Gästehaus No... view morefrom

€ 80Hotel-Gaststube 'Bei Berze'

Rheinböllen

This friendly, family-run hotel is situated in the centre of Rhinenböllen, in a peaceful and convenient location with good motorway connections... view morefrom
